amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for a public relations program designed to monitor news media in the United States and the Middle East and create a database of news stories to promote positive coverage of the war in Iraq.

action.text: Amendment SA 4909 proposed by Senator Menendez.
Motion to table amendment SA 4909 made in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 4909 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 44. Record Vote Number: 236.
